CLOSE Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg apologized for a "major breach of trust," admitted mistakes and outlined steps to protect user data in light of a privacy scandal involving the Trump-connected data-mining firm during a CNN interview.

A growing #DeleteFacebook movement has widened after it was revealed that Cambridge Analytica used vast amounts of Facebook user data — acquired without users' knowledge or permission — to build profiles of American voters to help Donald Trump's presidential campaign.

When someone on Twitter called his attention to them, he had them deleted, making him one of the highest-profile users to delete accounts on the social media platform in reaction to revelations that it did not protect user data.

2day I did something VERY HARD 4 me.Facebook has helped me with my Charity, &there are amazing young Ppl there.I have a special friend (Lauren)who I Respect & Admire,but today I deleted my Facebook account .
The phrase "delete Facebook" began trending upward as a Google search term on Sunday and has continued to spike over the course of the week.
As of Friday morning the pages for both Tesla and SpaceX, which designs, builds and launches rockets and spacecraft, were gone.
CLOSE Facebook faces the dilemma of losing trust and even users in the aftermath of the Cambridge Analytica data leak.
A Twitter message aimed at Musk Thursday night suggest he delete the SpaceX page on Facebook "if you're the man."
She wrote on Twitter that she'd done something "VERY HARD 4 me" because Facebook has helped her with her charity.
SAN FRANCISCO — Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk didn't realize the companies had Facebook pages.

On Tuesday, singer Cher also removed her Facebook page.
On Friday she tweeted "Finding since deleting Facebook I've deleted MANY APPS I DON'T NEED."
No number on how many users might have deleted their accounts was available.
